title: Substituting HPS with light-emitting diodes for supplemental lighting in greenhouses

title_detail.value: Substituting HPS with light-emitting diodes for supplemental lighting in greenhouses

summary: LEDs are capable of replacing HPS for supplemental lighting for cut gerbera production during darker periods.

summary_detail.value: LEDs are capable of replacing HPS for supplemental lighting for cut gerbera production during darker periods.
